survey_name: Online Banking Security Features Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess customer satisfaction with the security features provided by their online banking platforms, identifying areas for improvement and understanding user concerns.

questions.question_text: How often do you use online banking services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all possible usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you use online banking services?

questions.question_text: Which of the following security features are you familiar with in your online banking platform? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice responses. Ensure options are comprehensive.

script.question_text: Which of the following security features are you familiar with in your online banking platform? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the security features provided by your online banking platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the security features provided by your online banking platform?

questions.question_text: Have you ever experienced a security issue (e.g., unauthorized access, phishing) with your online banking account?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button. Include a 'Prefer not to say' option for sensitivity.

script.question_text: Have you ever experienced a security issue (e.g., unauthorized access, phishing) with your online banking account?

questions.question_text: If yes, how was the issue resolved?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button with an 'Other' option for additional details.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with open-text follow-up for 'Other' (SINGLE_CHOICE)

script.question_text: If yes, how was the issue resolved?

questions.question_text: What additional security features would you like to see in your online banking platform?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What additional security features would you like to see in your online banking platform?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your online banking platform to others based on its security features?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for likelihood measurement. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your online banking platform to others based on its security features?

questions.question_text: Which device do you primarily use for online banking?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button with an 'Other' option for additional details.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with open-text follow-up for 'Other' (SINGLE_CHOICE)

script.question_text: Which device do you primarily use for online banking?

questions.question_text: Do you feel that your online banking platform provides enough information about security best practices?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button. Include a 'Not sure' option for neutrality.

script.question_text: Do you feel that your online banking platform provides enough information about security best practices?

questions.question_text: How important is the security of your online banking platform when choosing a bank?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for importance measurement. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How important is the security of your online banking platform when choosing a bank?
